summary:
How do these types of people keep finding poor Phil? Harold gets a full 5/5 on the creepy scale.
Also, why does everyone have an...
body:
How do these types of people keep finding poor Phil? Harold gets a full 5/5 on the creepy scale.

Also, why does everyone have an obsession with his feet? What if Harold and Susan were the same people who asked him for photos of them for £76? 🤔

tags: he really likes the name susan
summary:
Phil: I'm going to change their names.
Harold: I enjoy your videos alone but also with my partner.
Phil: I'm going to call her...
body:
Phil: I’m going to change their names.

Harold: I enjoy your videos alone but also with my partner.

Phil: I’m going to call her Susan.

Me: Of course. Always got to be called Susan.

blog.name: sartysarty

blog.description: Fan of all things funny.  Phan fan.  Nerdfighter.  Science geek.  Cat fan.  Anxiety haver. Music lover.  Nap taker.  She/Her

title: Gooooooood Evening
body:
It’s Thursday and Lucy is being ADORABLE.  Everything she does is cute.  She licks my phone.  She licks my nose.  She sleeps on my arm.  She purrs into my neck.  It’s just to flipping cute for one kitten and I think she’s breaking some physics laws.

Phil’s new video was so great!  What a creepy letter!  I think he’s probably seen much worse, but this one was at least shareable, lol.  I love Phil’s energy in this video:  so creeped out, yet upbeat!  I like it when he is happy:) . And I’m glad he mentioned the white speck because I was obsessing over it most of the time!

Sooooooo.   You all know I love Amy Grant.  Well, she is coming near me (1.5 hours away) in September and I already asked off of work and my sister is buying the tickets during the presale when they go up tomorrow!

Great, right?

Well, I’m already freaking out, because as part of the presale for Friends of Amy members (as I am) you get to go to the sound check. And at the sound check, you get to meet her.

OMFG.

My social anxiety is already through the roof.  I mean, even if I were alone, I don’t know if I could do it, but with my sister there? OMG.  

Amy was my first record, first cassette tape, first CD, first concert…She means so much to me.  My sister and I sometimes just send each other snippets of lines from Amy songs via email and the other one completes the line and sends it back.  LOL.  We give each other compliments by saying things like, “Your hair is very “Unguarded” era today!” (referencing her album “Unguarded”).  

So, yeah.  How can I meet her? Everyone who has met her has said she is soooooooooooo kind and giving. That she looks at you like you are the only person in the room and is very patient and sweet.  

How can I say, in 10 seconds, and without crying, everything she means to me?  

I can’t.  

UGH.  

And with my sister there, I don’t know if I’ll be able to talk. It’s the dang social anxiety.  

So now I’m like…I hope there is NOT a sound check.  I just want to go to the concert and not have to meet her.  Isn’t that ridiculous?!?!

I feel like I could throw up, and it’s only JUNE.  

I mean, meeting Dan and Phil was hard for me as well, and as we all know, I messed up the last meeting by walking away without even saying bye because I was so nervous.  But…this is like…Dan and Phil coming to your house to spend the day.  That level of intensity.  


Okay, anyway, I’ve droned on long enough.

Here is a picture of little Lucy sleeping on my arm.  


Lucy and I wish you a lovely evening!

summary: i can’t believe phil got offered to be a sugar baby to a rich couple who offered him $1000 a week plus accommodation plus...

body:
Everyone in my house is calling my cat Dan…

.

.

.

...and his name isn’t Dan…

.

.

Is this a sign??? Is Dan’s new video going to be about cats??

.

“I have decided to take the lifestyle of a domesticated housecat….sleeping.” - probably Dan Howell
